meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nicholas Campiz Sally Sommers Smith Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6282.

td.p: Nicholas Campiz, a graduate student in geography from Gainesville, Florida
Sally Sommers Smith, a biology professor from Kennebunk, Maine
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $48,684)

tr.td: PATENTS OF WELL-KNOWN FOLKS
THE NUMBER AFTER 1: LITERARY EDITION
TAKING STOCK
LAND O' LAKERS
"OLD" ENGLISH

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1812 he completed his 7th & 8th Symphonies & wrote a letter in which he asked, "Can our love endure..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1812 he completed his 7th & 8th Symphonies & wrote a letter in which he asked, "Can our love endure..."

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Dave
Sally
Nicholas
(lock-tie game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Nicholas, we\'re looking for [*]. And we find it. If you risked more than a buck, you\'re the new champion. No.)
[The audience gasps at Nicholas\'s $0 wager.]
(Alex: You didn\'t. So you\'re gonna be a champ, and Dave\'s gonna be a champ. Returning champions. And, Sally, you\'re gonna wind up with our parting gift of $2,000 in cash.)
[Johnny Gilbert\'s "Prizes for our second- and third-place contestants provided by Aleve", begun since show #6211, aired 2011-09-26, replaced with "Second place prizes sponsored by Aleve". See also show #6227, aired 2011-10-18.]
SallyWhat is Neptune?
$4,500
DaveWhat is Neptune?
$6,100
NicholasWhat is Neptune??
$0
Neptune')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In July 2011 it completed its first orbit around the Sun since its discovery in 1846')

tr.td: ASTRONOMY
In July 2011 it completed its first orbit around the Sun since its discovery in 1846
Dave
Sally
Nicholas
4-day co-champion: $60,884
2nd place: $2,000
New co-champion: $12,200
Dave
Sally
Nicholas

15 R,
7 W
(including 1 DD)

9 R,
3 W

25 R,
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
